com.orc.io
Class SimpleClientContext

java.lang.Object
  com.orc.io.SimpleClientContext

public class SimpleClientContext
extends java.lang.Object

A client context keeps track of a client's socket's, callback keys and other data. This is a very simplified client context, a more robust version would have it's own ByteBuffer's for keeping track of reading and writing. For the simplified version I'm just keeping track of the SocketChannel and SelectionKey

Field Summary
 java.nio.channels.SelectionKey key
          This is the reference key used by NIO to keep track of callbacks
 java.nio.channels.SocketChannel socket
          This is the channel used to communicate to the client/server You need it to write data to the socket
